name: Cracked Demo
description:
Cracked is an unforgiving 2D platforming game, where players have to overcome increasingly difficult levels, in varying environments.

Wishlist on steam for more.

  • 3 Campaigns (all of which have their own theme)
  • 60+ Maps (20 per campaign)
  • 4 Playable Characters (Bob, George, Xayzavian, Fred)
  • In-game timer (speedrunning capability)
  • One handed controls (click and drag)
  • Frustrating
  • Join Bob and his friends on an adventure, and experience different thrilling environments.
  • Explore an abandoned factory, a haunted pyramid and an eerie jungle, with more mysteries to uncover.
  • Discover new mechanics to progress the levels and overcome the challenging obstacles presented.
  • Play a total of 60 maps in 3 different campaigns, all with their own individually themed surroundings and atmosphere.
  • Each campaign unlocks a new playable character upon completion.
